title: Eclectic Living in The Heights
posting_body: Stylish 1- and 2-bedroom apartments - GE Energy Star stainless steel appliances - French door refrigerators - Wine chillers - Vicostone quartz countertops and tile backsplashes - Industrial brushed nickel lighting pendants and fixtures - Kitchen and bath fixtures by Delta - Distressed wood-style Daltile shower surrounds - Hardwood flooring in living and dining areas - Frameless shower enclosures - Front-loading washer dryers.

Club Room with entertaining kitchen - Private coworking - Fitness and yoga studio - 3rd level pool terrace w/private poolside cabanas - Shaded poolside veranda w/outdoor kitchen and grill - Social courtyard - Fastest available WiFi built-in throughout entire community - 1st level retail partner - Paw spa and dog run - EV charging stations
Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability

Dry cleaning service, Bus stop, Outdoor Grills, Free WiFi Areas, Picnic area, Door to door trash pickup, Pool, Elevators, Fitness center, Business center, Gated entrance, Community parking garage, Handicap modified units, School bus stop, Dog Park, Club house
